description.en: The Cloak of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Don the mask for even more powa!
description.ar: The Cloak of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Don the mask for even more powa!
description.br: O Manto do fabuloso Dragão-rei Todo-Poderoso.
description.de: Der Umhang des sagenumwobenen Almighty Dragon King Sets. Trage das ganze Kostüm, um erstaunliche Boni zu erhalten! Trage zusätzlich die Maske, um noch mehr Macht zu haben!
description.fi: The Cloak of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Don the mask for even more powa!
description.fil: The Cloak of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Don the mask for even more powa!
description.fr: La Cape de l'incroyable set du Dragon-Roi Tout-Puissant. Porter les 4 pièces d'équipement accorde de fantastiques bonus ! Portez le masque pour encore plus de puissance !
description.id: The Cloak of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Mengenakan ini dengan set kostum lengkap memberikan bonus luar biasa! Kenakan topeng untuk lebih banyak kekuatan!
description.it: The Cloak of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Don the mask for even more powa!
description.jp: 破壊の竜王セットのマント。セットで装備すると効果絶大！マスク着用でさらにステータスアップ！
description.kr: 전설의 전능 용왕 세트의 망토입니다. 이것을 모든 의상 세트으로 입으면 놀라운 보너스를 줍니다! 더 강해지려면 마스크를 착용하세요!
description.nl: The Cloak of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Don the mask for even more powa!
description.pl: The Cloak of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Don the mask for even more powa!
description.ru: The Cloak of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Don the mask for even more powa!
description.sp: La Capa del Conjunto del legendario Rey Dragón Todopoderoso. ¡Usar esto con el conjunto completo otorga bonificaciones increíbles! ¡Ponte la máscara para obtener aún más poder!
description.sw: The Cloak of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing this with the full costume set grants amazing bonuses! Don the mask for even more powa!
description.th: เสื้อคลุมของเซ็ตราชามังกรผู้ยิ่งใหญ่ในตำนาน การสวมชุดนี้พร้อมกับชุดคอสตูมเต็มรูปแบบจะมอบโบนัสที่น่าทึ่ง! สวมหน้ากากเพื่อ powa มากยิ่งขึ้น!
description.tw: 傳說中的全能破壞龍王套裝的斗篷。 將其與全套服裝搭配使用可獲得驚人的額外加乘！戴上面具以獲得更多波瓦！
description.vi: Áo choàng của Bộ Long Vương Toàn Năng trong truyện ngụ ngôn. Mặc cái này với bộ trang phục đầy đủ sẽ mang lại những khoản tiền thưởng đáng kinh ngạc!
